Live: speech at the 70th General Assembly of #ONU http://t.co/hxT83rujjx #UNGA #DilmaNaONU
The advisory tweets now excerpts from the speech of the president #DilmaNaONU http://t.co/hxT83rujjx #UNGA
#DilmaNaONU The multiplication of regional conflicts, as well as the spread of terrorism, destroys the patrimony of humanity (...)
(...) expelled from its centuries-old communities millions of people, show that the UN is facing a great challenge. #DilmaNaONU
One can not be complacent with such acts of barbarism as those perpetrated by the so-called Islamic State and other associated groups
This picture explains, to a large extent, the refugee crisis that humanity is currently experiencing. #DilmaNaONU
In a world where goods, capital, information and ideas circulate freely, it is absurd to prevent the free flow of people. #DilmaNaONU
#DilmaNaONU Brazil is a host country. A country made up of refugees.
We have received Syrians, Haitians, people from all over the world, as we have been harboring millions of Europeans, Arabs and Asians for more than a century.
#DilmaNaONU We are a multiethnic country that lives with differences and knows their importance to make us strong, rich and diverse.
We need a UN that can foster sustainable peace at the international level and act quickly and effectively in crises (...)
(...) located regional wars and any acts against humanity. #DilmaNaONU
Today, the Brazilian economy is stronger, stronger and more resilient than it was a few years ago. #DilmaNaONU
We are able to overcome the current difficulties and advance in the path of development. #DilmaNaONU
We are in a moment of transition to another more profound, solid and long-lasting cycle of expansion. #DilmaNaONU
In addition to fiscal rebalancing actions, d stimulus to exports, we adopted measures to encourage investment in infrastructure and energy
In Brazil, the process of social inclusion was not interrupted. #DilmaNaONU
We expect that inflation control, growth recovery and credit will contribute to a further expansion of household consumption.
#DilmaNaONU These are the bases for a new cycle of growth and development based on increased productivity (...)
(...) and the generation of more investment opportunities for companies and jobs for citizens. #DilmaNaONU

This will be a unique opportunity to spread sport as a fundamental instrument for promoting peace, social inclusion and tolerance (...)
(...) through the fight against racial, ethnic and gender discrimination. #DilmaNaONU
It will also be an opportunity for us to promote the inclusion of people with disabilities, one of the priorities of my government. #DilmaNaONU
